body: The glasses guy was loyal enough to wait for her, he tells her he’ll still wait for her, even though she was trying to be with blondie. But I’m glad she broke it off. Finally, good to see a female character not just be an extra in someone’s harem, but instead go her own way. Even if she went about it in a weird way. Also looks like they’re dating on page 194 in the bottom left corner panel.
